direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve user-specific data but for different purposes (coins vs. account snapshots).
Both methods involve operations related to user assets and require similar parameter handling.
Both methods involve fetching historical data related to user assets with similar control flows.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized for sending signed requests.
Environment setup is required before making any signed requests to the Binance API.
Both methods handle API responses and need to verify the format of the returned data.
